summary: WebSocket Real-time Dashboard and Mobile Responsiveness Testing Complete - All features working correctly

minor.issue: Returns 404 - endpoint not found (may be deprecated or renamed)

test_credentials: N/A - no auth required for tested features
context_for_next_testing_agent: WebSocket real-time dashboard working correctly. Fornitori page shows 155 suppliers. Mobile responsiveness working with bottom navbar visible. All KPI cards show LIVE badges when WebSocket connected.

websocket_realtime_dashboard.details: WebSocket indicator shows 'Real-time' (green). 4 LIVE badges visible on KPI cards. KPI data updates correctly. GET /api/realtime/status returns status: online.

fornitori_page_155_records.details: Page shows '155 Totale Fornitori', '155 Con Fatture', '89 Dati Incompleti'. Supplier cards display correctly with P.IVA, location, fatture count, payment method.

mobile_responsiveness.details: Dashboard Analytics and Fornitori pages adapt correctly to 390x844 viewport. Mobile navbar visible at bottom (Home, Fatture, Banca, Dipend., Menu). KPI cards stack vertically on mobile.

dashboard_analytics_kpi.details: Shows Fatturato Totale (€10.098,90), Entrate (€1.718,30), Uscite (€79.850,38), Cash Flow (€-78.132,08). Charts display correctly (Fatturato Mensile, Distribuzione Spese, Cash Flow Mensile).
